sathara riyanak nohoth adi hayak diga pollak yashtiyak ho dandu kadak athathiwa sitina nirogi shrawayeku ho shrawakayan samuhayak idiriye bana daham deshana kirima ha pirith sajjayana kirima pera sadahan kala ‘sekhiyawe ‘ menma ashobhana dasunak mawannak ha awathak siduwana warada sahagatha karyayak bawin aniwaryayenma ese kirimen walaki sitiya yuthuya.shrawakayin thaman atha darana kinam aakara ho dandu kadak paseka thaba deshaka swamin wahanse idiriye padurak wani bim mattamata ayath asunaka ekathpaswa wadiwi siti nam eki aakara shrawakayan idiriye bana daham desima ha pirith sajjayana kirima warada sahagatha nowe.3.

yata li muttu niwaradi kramaya kimbaul thalla kramaya yata li niwaradi kramaya jataporoththama yata li thabime di me upades pilipadinna 1 yata li muttu kirime di yakada ana nogasiya yuthuya. 2 yataliya muttu kirimata awashya wam kimbaul katta kapa ema liyenma li anayak sada gasa ganna. 3 pradhana yataliyata thani muttuwak ho muttu 3k nowiya yuthuya. 4 mudun yataliyata kurupa 1 ho 3k nothabiya yuthuya. 5 yataliyak balkayak uluwassak janelayak hari madata nowiya yuthuya. 6 yata li wahalayata elimedi eya 3,5, ho 7 nowiya yuthuya. 7 yatali muttu 3k eka kelin nowiya yuthuya. 9 monama hethuwak nisawath pradhana yataliyata haras athata sitina lesata thawa yataliyak muttu nokala yuthu ya.

eksath jathika pakshaye arbudayanta wisandumak lesa jathika nayaka ranil wikramasinha mahatha wisin yojana karamin pasugiyada kruthyadhikari mandalaya wisin anumatha kala nawa thanathuruwalata ayath wagakim saha karyayange swabhawaya kumakda yanna pahadili kara nomathi bawin ema thanathuruwala wagakim sambandhayen barapathala arbudayak mathuwa athayi ejapa kruthyadhikari mandala jyeshta samajikayaku ‘dinamina’ ta eeye (01 da) sandahan kaleya.me anuwa nayakathwaya wisin niyojya nayaka dhurayata sajith premadasa mahathawa da upa nayaka dhurayata rawi karunanayaka mahathawa da yojana kara athi namuth ema thanathuru deka athara athi wenasa ho eyin ihala pahala thibenne kumana dhuraya da yanna pahadili kirimak kara nothibima hethuwen mema arbudaya pana nagi athayi da hethema pawasiya.eyata amatharawa danata kriyathmaka wana nayakathwa mandalaya mema thanathuru dekath samanga sthanagatha wanne kothanaka dayi pahadili kirimak da nathi bawin mema arbudaya thawath uthsanna wi athayi ema prakashakaya sandahan kale ya.esema niyojya nayakathwaya laba ganima sandaha sajith premadasa mahatha idiripath kala kondesiwalata siduwu deya thawamath pahadili nathi athara, thama niyojya nayakathwayata path wanne nam nayakathwa mandalaya ahosi kala yuthu yayi da ejapa samajikathwayen iwath kara athi samahara samajikayan kondesi wirahithawa nawatha warak pakshayata bandawa gatha yuthuwa athayi sandahan kondesiwalata kumak siduwuye dayi danaganimata nathi bawa da hethema sandahan kaleya.ee anuwa wasaraka kalasimawak sandaha path karanu labu eksath jathika pakshaye nayakathwa mandalaya nowambar masayedi nila kalasimawa awasan wana bawin eya digu kirimakata noyama ibema ahosi wana paridi kriya kirimata eksath jathika pakshaye kruthyadhikari mandalaya katayuthu kirima da pakshaya thula arbudayak mathu kirimata hethuwi athayi da hethema sandahan kaleya.ee anuwa nayakathwa mandalaye sabhapathi karu jayasuriya mahatha athulu samajika pirisawa athhara janadhipathiwaranaya sandaha meheyum kamituwak path kirimata eksath jathika pakshaye jathika nayaka ranil wikramasinha mahatha athulu 19 denaku path kirimata piyawara gena athayi ohu wadiduratath penwa dunne ya.
